channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Spark
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Spark

item.title: CVE-2018-11760|2024-09-16T19:19:24.731Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20spark
item.description: When using PySpark , it's possible for a different local user to connect to the Spark application and impersonate the user running the Spark application. This affects versions 1.x, 2.0.x, 2.1.x, 2.2.0 to 2.2.2, and 2.3.0 to 2.3.1.
